channel.title: Can't Run My Server [508]
channel.description:
ok i dont know what happens but, everytime i click run it closes. this is whats inside the runserver.bat
@echo off cls cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" net/com/espeon/Server 43594 goto main pause
And this is what it shows when i click run, i tried stopping it as fast as i could
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/espeon/Server Press any key to continue . . .
PLEASE HELP ME

item.title: Can't Run My Server [508]
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

u dont have jdk1.6.0 because u should have something like this jdk1.6.0_12 exc

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Run My Server [508]
item.dc:creator: @i_k0_ur_m0m_i i k0 ur m0m i
item.description:
@i_k0_ur_m0m_i wrote:

because it closes really quick, and i have jdk1.6.0, and jre1.6.0 and jre6, i dont know whats wrong. but my computer is from the year 2000 so that might be the problem

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Run My Server [508]
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

So he could see the error. Where it saus “jdk1.6.0” shouldn’t that say “jdk1.6.0_##” Replace the ## with your update of JDK.

Read full topic
